Problem using quest packager - it comes up with error 430
I was hoping to share my first game with a few friends - been looking for an easy game builder and this fits the bill, only snag is I cant package it and let them have it.
I take it that would save my game as an exe file so they can run on their machine..
Any advice on this would be great, its a good product in that U can knock up and run a game as soon as I can type it all in, started with a small game and its easy as pie so well done on that part it rocks :@)
I look forward to putting it on textadventure.com soon as I make it a bit bigger and make it a bit more interesting !!
Cheers again.

Packager 4.1.2
I'm using XP with Service pack 2
